of passenger bus drivers The incident took place

flower street in Duc Lieu commune, Bu Dang district. The

years old, from Nghe An. Hoang let his car go.
bypassing the village and not even giving way
when confronting a truck, forcing
this vehicle to ignore the road, then
another truck came to block the passenger car,
only then did Hoang give way at the
meeting with the police.  The reckless driver
admitted his violation.
Hoang had his driver's license temporarily suspended
pending

handle a forest fire that occurred in the
Phung mountain area of ​​​​the relic complex.  The
history and scenic beauty of Ba
Den Mountain in Tay Ninh province. Until
last night, March 20, the authorities
were still trying to extinguish the fire that broke
out at about 9:00 a.m. on March 20
as soon as  Detecting a forest fire, the
authorities arrived promptly to
put out the fire. However, due to complex terrain
and high winds, it made
firefighting difficult. Nearly 100 people were
mobilized to participate in the firefighting effort.  The
fire prevention and fighting police force of
Tay Ninh province deployed the
Ngoc road with a length of more than 1 km to
bring water to the mountain and at the same time joined the
militia rangers to approach the
fire to localize and establish the runway.  The
total forest area belonging to the
Ba Den Mountain historical and scenic relic complex is over 1,500 hectares.
This is a special-use forest. From the beginning of the dry season, the
forest owner has fully implemented
measures to prevent forest fires.  Treat vegetation
according to the approved plan,
